author: arj
msg: Moved most of the logic for parsing and validating user profile data from JSPs to this class. This may or may not be the right place to put them, but it's better than cluttering the JSPs.

author: arj
msg: Two primary changes: added support for auto-installation of default JAAS and J2SE policies; and enclosed potentially sensitive operations such as reading the LoginConfiguration in doPrivileged{} blocks. This will be necessary for users who run Tomcat with a security manager.

author: arj
msg: WikiPrincipal changed to accommodate a "type" field... so we needed to change this method too. It's a bit more flexible now...

author: arj
msg: Needed to add an accessor to UserManager... about a half-dozen methods rely on it.

author: arj
msg: Added a context constant for the registration page.
